, p. 91). de Finetti’s result was historically important as a foundation of Bayesianism.
Our result shows, again, that the most critical case of “bookmaking” occurs when there are
maximal possibilities of hedging (antimonotonicity). That is, de Finetti needed to defend
his condition only for antimonotonic cases.
